//General CoWApp Yes No //Data Protection Accept Decline Terms of Use You agree that CoWApp is allowed to activate the Bluetooth of your device and send or receive data via it (generated keys with time stamp and location as well as information about your current infection status). 
Permission to activate your GPS location is also required for this in order to enable Bluetooth transmission with people in your surroundings. 
Furthermore you agree that the app may run as a background process on your mobile device at any time and is allowed to send your generated and collected anonymous keys to the server if there is an existing infection and you push notifications, too. 
This is the only way the correct function of the Corona-Warn-App is given. Agreement required You have to accept the terms of use to use the application. Okay Exit //Permission Requesting This app needs background location access Please grant location access so this app can detect COVID contacts in the background Functionality limited Since background location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover COVID contacts in the background. Please go to Settings -> Applications -> Permissions and grant background location access to this app Bluetooth not enabled Please enable Bluetooth and restart the application or use "Request Permissions again" Bluetooth LE not available This device doesn't support Bluetooth-Low-Energy technology. Therefore you won't be able to use the app on this device Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover COVID contacts in the background Since background location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover beacons when in the background Request permissions again //Main LOG Info Test Negative test report Report Infection Further Information Suspicion? Negative Test Report View to show the current risk status via traffic light status. Click to show the information page about the risk level calculation. Please enable Bluetooth Your Bluetooth is disabled.
The App needs Bluetooth and GPS (Location) to be always turned on to detect Covid contacts. Please enable GPS (Location) Your GPS (Location) is disabled.
The App needs Bluetooth and GPS (Location) to be always turned on to detect Covid contacts. //Main risk status Current risk Low Risk Moderate Risk High Risk Risk Level: %1$d of 100 Current Infection //Report Infection / negative test result No Yes Report Infection Report Negative Test Result Do you really want to report yourself infected? 
(Only with positive PCR test result.) Do you really want to report yourself negative? 
(Only with negative PCR test result.) Thank you for the report! The app warns your surroundings. Please inform your local health department and immediately go into 14-day quarantine. Report successful You have been successfully reported negative. Thank you! //Date and days since use Since %1$s you are helping for %2$d days to fight the Coronavirus. //Info Menu and pages Further Information General Information The CoWApp (Corona Warning App) is an application that anyone can use to further contain the spread of the coronavirus. 
With it potential contact with corona-infected people can be determined in everyday life and an infection risk can be calculated. It is displayed by the traffic light principle and a risk value of 1 to 100. 
You will also receive a push notification when a potential health risk has been identified so you know how to act correctly to protect yourself and those around you. 
Under Suspicion? you can receive information on what to do if you suspect an infection. //Info screen about the risk level Risk Level Information Risk Level and Traffic Light Explanation: To clarify to the user how high his risk of infection is, the CoW–App provides a risk level value, which is a numerical value between 0 (no risk) and 100 (existing infection).For further clarity and how the user should best behave, the CoWApp divides and simplifies the risk level via the traffic light display. A risk value less than 35 (i.e. 0 – 34) results in a green traffic light color, which signals to the user that an infection is very unlikely and that he can therefore be unconcerned. A value between 35 and 70 results in a yellow traffic light color, which means that an infection is already possible but not very likely.If the risk level is in the lower range, close to 35, an infection is unlikely. In order to relieve the health care system, no measures should be considered that burden the health care system. However, if the risk level is close to the upper limit of 70, measures such as a corona test are recommended, as the possibility of infection is more likely.A risk level above 70 causes the traffic light to turn red, indicating a high probability of infection. Measures such as a corona test, keeping distance from other people and even quarantine are strongly recommended. Explanation of the Calculation To understand the calculation the following terms should be clarified first. contact: A so-called contact was determined by the exchange of keys between end devices. Only contacts with users who are already infected or subsequently reported as infected are included in the risk calculation. These contacts are further specified by evaluating them as either direct or indirect contact. Direct contact: means that there has been contact with a person reported as infected. Indirect contact means a contact with a person who is not reported as infected itself, but has had contact with a third person who is reported as infected To calculate the risk level, all direct and indirect contacts as well as the user's self-infection report from the last 14 days are taken into account. The duration of the contacts is also included in the calculation. //Infection info Current Infection - How to act? In the event of an acute infection, you are obliged to go into quarantine immediately and remain in quarantine for 14 days or until you receive a negative PCR test result. 
You are also obliged to notify your local health department. 
Any roommates should also be tested immediately and you are encouraged to distance yourself from them. 
Further information at the page of the federal government or the WHO: https://www.bundesregierung.de/breg-de/themen/coronavirus/coronavirus-wissen for German speaking people or https://www.who.int/health-topics/coronavirus#tab=tab_1 for general information. //Suspicion Suspicion? - What to do? In case of suspicion, please go into quarantine immediately and let yourself be tested. 
If the test result is positive, please inform the health department for your region and stay in quarantine for 14 days. 
If the test result is negative, you can end the quarantine. 
 You can report a negative test result even if you`re not currently infected, so your risk level can be adjusted. 
Thank you for your help to dam the further spread of the corona virus. //LOG Notification Log This is a notification //Push Notification NotificationChannel This channel is for push notifications to inform about possible health risk Okay Possible health risk A person with whom you were in direct or indirect contact has been infected with the corona virus. Please let yourself be tested and go into quarantine until you receive a negative test result. Direct contact with an infected person detected Tap for further information. Indirect contact with an infected person detected Currently no connection to the server Trying to connect again in 5 minutes… //BeaconBackgroundService (foreground) Notification Protection active //Debug Menu Test-Actions Debug-Log-Settings Debug-Log What do you want to log? CLEAR DEBUG LOG UPDATE SETTINGS when the alarm rings when the alarm is set when a key is transmitted when a key is saved Key was saved: Received a Key: Alarm ring. Alarm set. Your Settings were saved. You are about to clear the Debug-Log Are you sure you want to clear the Debug-Log? confirm The Debug-Log was cleared. Action canceled //Test Menu Test menu push notification test key generation test risk level test check infection status test log own keys test delete own keys test reset risk level Transmitting on/off Scanning on/off add Test Contact List Risklevel Algorithm: Calculate Risk level CheckOutDatedInfection SetInfectionAsOutdated Activate 15m business Risklevel Algorithm: Add Indirect Test Contact Risklevel Algorithm: Add Direct Test Contact Risklevel Algorithm: Remove all Test Contacts check ControlKeyExchangeFunction Which benefits does the CoW-App offer? What does the CoW-App do? How does the CoW-App work? Why should I use the CoW-App? Who is behind the CoW-App? What are the different risk-statuses and how should you behave in the different risk -statuses? When does the CoW-App warn? How does the use of the CoW-App affect the battery performance of the smartphone and the storage space? How are data-security and data-protection guaranteed by the CoW-App? Is the “high risk” warning from the CoW-App sufficient as a sick leave or as quarantine order? What is the Significance of the Risk-Level? Why does the CoW-App need my location? Which personal data are saved by the CoW-App? The CoW-App helps to defeat the Coronavirus. It documents the encounter between two smartphones and makes it possible to identify contact chains and warn people quickly if the have had contact with a person who was tested Corona-positive. The faster people are informed about this, the faster they can take appropriate steps and avoid unnecessarily infecting many more people. This is why the app is a useful tool for combating the Coronavirus together with all other measures. The CoW-App informs you if you have had contact with someone who later was tested positive for corona. In addition, you will be provided with recommendations for actions, which will enable you to behave accordingly and avoid the further spread of the Coronavirus. The tracking of infection chains, which is otherwise done manually and takes a long time, can therefore be accelerated significantly with the CoW-App. If installed, the app runs in the background on your smartphone and exchanges random-ID-codes with other smartphones in the vicinity in order to make it possible to identify the contact person and the chain of infection. From these random-ID-codes it is not possible to deduce who the users are or where the transmission took place. The CoW-App uses Bluetooth technology and measures the distance and duration of contact with other users of the app you meet. When there is an encounter, random-ID-codes are then exchanged in order to document the encounter. If a person is tested Corona-positive, they can voluntarily report their infection anonymously via the app. In this case, the collected random-ID-codes of the person are transmitted to the server and made available there for contact determination. Once you have installed the app, it will regularly check for you whether you have met people who were tested positive for corona. This check takes place via a request to the server. Your risk level will be recalculated based on the results of these checks and you will be warned if necessary. Your anonymity is preserved throughout the whole process. Neither your identity nor your location can be determined. 
 
The App is currently available in the following two languages: German and English. By using the App, you contribute to the fight against Corona and prevent other people from suffering unnecessarily. By using the App, you can quickly find out if you have had contact with an infected person and thus protect those around you by quarantining yourself or taking appropriate steps. The CoW-App is a project on behalf of the University Heilbronn. The Hopper GmbH developed the application based on a central software architecture. Your current risk-status is derived from your personal risk level. To calculate the risk level the following is considered: direct or indirect contacts with people who later tested positive for corona. 
The different risk-statuses are: 
 
low risk: 
No contact could be established. Information is provided about generally applicable distance regulations and hygiene recommendations. 
 
moderate risk: 
It was found that in the last 14 days there was at least one indirect contact with a person who was later tested as corona-positive. It is recommended to avoid unnecessary meetings with other people. 
 
high risk: 
It was found that in the last 14 days there was at least one direct contact with a person who was later tested as Corona-positive. It is recommended to go home or to stay at home and to contact the family doctor, the medical on-call service on 116117 or the health department by phone and agree on how to proceed. 
 
current infection: 
The person reported himself infected. It is recommended to go home or to stay at home and to contact the family doctor, the medical on-call service on 116117 or the health department by phone and agree on how to proceed. If someone with whom you have been in contact reports themselves as infected, you will be warned within half an hour at the latest. Whether a person reports themselves infected or not is voluntary and depends entirely on that person. In order to report as infected, the person must press the "Report infection" button in the app and then confirm. The application runs in the background to save batteries. Care was taken to develop the app in a way that saves batteries and storage space. The protection of your privacy is a top priority for the Hopper GmbH. Therefore, users do not have to register in order to use the App. Everything takes place anonymously and all data will be deleted after a maximum of 14 days. No. The "high risk" warning simply means that direct contact has been made with someone who later reported infected. It is recommended that the user contact his family doctor, the medical on-call service 116 117 or the health department by telephone. A sick leave or a quarantine order is made by the family doctor or the health department The risk level is represented by a value between 1 (low risk) and 100 (infected). When calculating the risk level, the following three factors are considered: direct contacts, indirect contacts and the infection-report. The risk level is used to provide the user with a more specific picture of the situation and the risk-status is then derived from this risk level. If the risk level was lower than 35, no contact could be found. In the range between 35 and 69, only indirect contacts were found. Direct contacts were found in the range between 70 and 95, but the user has not yet reported himself to be infected. The value 100 means that the user has reported himself infected. The authorization to use the location is technically necessary to use the Bluetooth technology. The location of a user is never read out or used in any way. Your personal data are safe all the time. You are anonymous when you use the App. To use the App, you do not have to register. All data – for example an encounter with other people, which are using this app – are saved anonymous and just for a short period of time. There are short-lived random-ID-codes from other smartphones saved, when you encounter them. In case of an infection you can voluntarily share your collected random-ID-codes and provide them to the server. With this data the server can determine encounters and warn people which had contact to someone, who later was tested Corona-positive. There is no data saved or read, which can be used to identify a user. It is sure that: A person tested Corona-positive will not know, who was warned because of a contact to him. The contact persons will not know who the person with Corona was.
